Projects Portfolio

Here are some of the projects that I have made.

Artist Website

A modern, immersive portfolio and music hub for Pritish S. It features a visually earthy tone with aesthetic overlays, bold branding, and smooth animations. Visitors can explore my biography, browse a full discography, and connect via social media.

HTML5CSS3JavaScriptUI/UX Design
Official Link
Arcane Accounts - Gamified Budgeting App

A game-like budgeting and finance tracking Android application. It incorporates features like achievements and levels to make budgeting more enjoyable. The app was developed using Kotlin and Firebase for the backend.

KotlinAndroid StudioFirebaseMobile Development
Source Code
ColourBounce WebGame

A vibrant browser-based arcade game built with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. Features real-time physics, responsive controls, dynamic ball movement, and increasing difficulty with animated obstacles. Fully custom design and code, optimized for desktop browsers.

HTML5CSS3JavaScriptGame Logic
Source Code
Interactive Web-Based Music Player

A feature-rich music player with a custom playlist, album art, real-time waveform visualization with click-and-drag seeking, and controls for volume, tempo, and pitch. Built with modern front-end technologies.

HTML5CSS3JavaScriptAudio ProcessingUI/UX
Source Code
KineticGlass Cars - E-commerce Concept

A fully responsive, single-page e-commerce experience built from scratch. Features a dynamic product catalogue rendered from a client-side data array, interactive filtering, details modals, and a stateful shopping cart. Implements a fluid 'glassmorphism' UI and GSAP animations.

JavaScript (ES6+)HTML5CSS3GSAP
Source Code
Personal Portfolio Website (This Site)

Designed and built this modern, product-showcase-inspired portfolio website using C# and ASP.NET Core MVC. The project emphasizes a strong visual and interactive user experience with features like animated text and dynamic skill-bar rendering. Structured with a data-driven backend for easy content management.

C#ASP.NET Core MVC.NET 8Bootstrap
Classic Central Radio App (In Development)

A modern Android application for Classic Central Radio, featuring live streaming, integrated media controls, user authentication (email, Google, Facebook), and a dynamic light/dark theme. Currently in active development.

KotlinAndroid StudioFirebaseLive Streaming
